actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require that certain drugs and pharmaceuticals be prominently labeled as to the date beyond which potency or efficacy becomes diminished.
short_title: Prescription and Over-the-Counter Drug Freshness Act

summary.text: Prescription and Over-the-Counter Drug Freshness Act - Requires that specified drugs and pharmaceuticals be prominently labeled as to the date beyond which potency or efficacy becomes diminished.

titles.title: Prescription and Over-the-Counter Drug Freshness Act
A bill to require that certain drugs and pharmaceuticals be prominently labeled as to the date beyond which potency or efficacy becomes diminished.
